sqlMap.select:
SELECT ENVDEVICEID as "envdeviceid", DEVICEID as "deviceid", DEVICENAME as "devicename", SOURCENAME as "sourcename", FACTORNAME as "factorname", OUTTYPE as "outtype", PROCESSID as "processid", PROCESSNAME as "processname", PROCESSTYPE as "processtype", CANUSE as "canuse", PROCESSINFO as "processinfo", PORTID as "portid", PORTNAME as "portname", ISRIGHT as "isright", PORTTYPE as "porttype", OTHER as "other", DEVICETYPE as "devicetype", OUTTO as "outto", PORTOUTTYPE as "portouttype", OUTRULE as "outrule", STATUS as "status", CREATOR as "creator", CREATED_TIME as "createdTime", MODIFIER as "modifier", UPDATED_TIME as "updatedTime" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ENVDEVICE WHERE 1=1
ENVDEVICEID = #envdeviceid#
DEVICETYPE = #devicetype#
DEVICEID like '%$deviceid$%'
DEVICENAME like '%$devicename$%'
outtype like '%$outtype$%'
$orderBy$
ENVDEVICEID asc

SELECT ENVDEVICEID as "envdeviceid", DEVICEID as "deviceid", DEVICENAME as "devicename", SOURCENAME as "sourcename", FACTORNAME as "factorname", OUTTYPE as "outtype", PROCESSID as "processid", PROCESSNAME as "processname", PROCESSTYPE as "processtype", CANUSE as "canuse", PROCESSINFO as "processinfo", PORTID as "portid", PORTNAME as "portname", ISRIGHT as "isright", PORTTYPE as "porttype", OTHER as "other", DEVICETYPE as "devicetype", OUTTO as "outto", PORTOUTTYPE as "portouttype", OUTRULE as "outrule", STATUS as "status", CREATOR as "creator", CREATED_TIME as "createdTime", MODIFIER as "modifier", UPDATED_TIME as "updatedTime" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ENVDEVICE WHERE 1=1
ENVDEVICEID NOT IN (#envdeviceid#)
$orderBy$
ENVDEVICEID asc

SELECT ENVDEVICEID as "envdeviceid", DEVICEID as "deviceid", DEVICENAME as "devicename", SOURCENAME as "sourcename", FACTORNAME as "factorname", OUTTYPE as "outtype", PROCESSID as "processid", PROCESSNAME as "processname", PROCESSTYPE as "processtype", CANUSE as "canuse", PROCESSINFO as "processinfo", PORTID as "portid", PORTNAME as "portname", ISRIGHT as "isright", PORTTYPE as "porttype", OTHER as "other", DEVICETYPE as "devicetype", OUTTO as "outto", PORTOUTTYPE as "portouttype", OUTRULE as "outrule", STATUS as "status", CREATOR as "creator", CREATED_TIME as "createdTime", MODIFIER as "modifier", UPDATED_TIME as "updatedTime" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ENVDEVICE order by ENVDEVICEID desc fetch first 1 rows only

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ENVDEVICE WHERE 1=1
ENVDEVICEID = #envdeviceid#
DEVICETYPE = #devicetype#
DEVICEID like '%$deviceid$%'
DEVICENAME like '%$devicename$%'
portid = #portid#
outtype = #outtype#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ENVDEVICE (ENVDEVICEID, DEVICEID, DEVICENAME, SOURCENAME, FACTORNAME, OUTTYPE, PROCESSID, PROCESSNAME, PROCESSTYPE, CANUSE, PROCESSINFO, PORTID, PORTNAME, ISRIGHT, PORTTYPE, OTHER, DEVICETYPE, OUTTO, PORTOUTTYPE, OUTRULE, STATUS, CREATOR, CREATED_TIME ) VALUES (#envdeviceid:VARCHAR#, #deviceid:VARCHAR#, #devicename:VARCHAR#, #sourcename:VARCHAR#, #factorname:VARCHAR#, #outtype:VARCHAR#, #processid:VARCHAR#, #processname:VARCHAR#, #processtype:VARCHAR#, #canuse:VARCHAR#, #processinfo:VARCHAR#, #portid:VARCHAR#, #portname:VARCHAR#, #isright:VARCHAR#, #porttype:VARCHAR#, #other:VARCHAR#, #devicetype:VARCHAR#, #outto:VARCHAR#, #portouttype:VARCHAR#, #outrule:VARCHAR#, #status:VARCHAR#, #creator:VARCHAR#, #createdTime:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ENVDEVICE SET DEVICEID = #deviceid#, DEVICENAME = #devicename#, SOURCENAME = #sourcename#, FACTORNAME = #factorname#, OUTTYPE = #outtype#, PROCESSID = #processid#, PROCESSNAME = #processname#, PROCESSTYPE = #processtype#, CANUSE = #canuse#, PROCESSINFO = #processinfo#, PORTID = #portid#, PORTNAME = #portname#, ISRIGHT = #isright#, PORTTYPE = #porttype#, OTHER = #other#, DEVICETYPE = #devicetype#, OUTTO = #outto#, PORTOUTTYPE = #portouttype#, OUTRULE = #outrule#, STATUS = #status#, MODIFIER = #modifier#, UPDATED_TIME = #updatedTime# WHERE ENVDEVICEID = #envdeviceid#

UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ENVDEVICE SET DEVICEID = #deviceid#, DEVICENAME = #devicename#, SOURCENAME = #sourcename#, FACTORNAME = #factorname#, OUTTYPE = #outtype#, OTHER = #other#, MODIFIER = #modifier#, UPDATED_TIME = #updatedTime# WHERE ENVDEVICEID = #envdeviceid#

UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ENVDEVICE SET DEVICEID = #deviceid#, DEVICENAME = #devicename#, OUTTO = #outto#, PORTOUTTYPE = #portouttype#, OUTRULE = #outrule#, FACTORNAME = #factorname#, OTHER = #other#, MODIFIER = #modifier#, UPDATED_TIME = #updatedTime# WHERE ENVDEVICEID = #envdeviceid#
